events.name: XinFin at Hackference India 2018 - Bangalore
events.overview: Hackference, bringing people from a multitude of organisation, educational backgrounds, belonging to different strata of society to constitute the biggest ever open source Hackathon in the country.

events.name: Global Blockchain Hackathon - Mumbai
events.overview: XinFin Community is sponsoring a global Blockchain Hackathon at KJSCE which will serve as a unique platform to helo coders showcase their skills using blockchain technology.Xinfin invites coders from all around the world to <strong>attend Global Blockchain Hackathon.

events.name: XinFin at CSI-SPIT Hackarhon2019 - Mumbai
events.overview: XinFin Community is sponsoring CSI-SPIT Hackarhon 2019 at Sardar Patel Instituteof technology cash prize more than Rs.100,000 Internship opportunities, goodies and lots more for the winners.
